metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1735 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine when the fetch module is used. An attacker could intercept the module, inject a new path, and then choose a new destination path on the controller node. All versions in 2.7.x, 2.8.x and 2.9.x branches are believed to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.7+dfsg-1').
